properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_TYPE, MEM_RESIDENCE, MEM_ENROLLDATE, MEM_STATUS, MEM_PROFILE_OG, MEM_PROFILE_REVISE, MEM_PROFILE_SAVEPATH FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_PWD, MEM_PHONE, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_TYPE, MEM_RESIDENCE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?
)

UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NICKNAME = ?, MEM_PHONE = ?, MEM_PWD = ?, MEM_EMAIL = ?, MEM_TYPE = ?
WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NICKNAME, MEM_PHONE, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_TYPE, MEM_RESIDENCE, MEM_ENROLLDATE, MEM_STATUS, MEM_PROFILE_OG, MEM_PROFILE_REVISE, MEM_PROFILE_SAVEPATH
FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEM_ID = ?
